<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
	ck outstanding as of September 8, 2016)
</FONT>
</P>

<DIV ID="PGBK" STYLE="WIDTH: 100%; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT;">
	&nbsp;
<HR STYLE="BORDER: CURRENTCOLOR; BORDER-IMAGE: NONE; WIDTH: 100%; HEIGHT: 2PX; COLOR: RGB(0, 0, 0); PAGE-BREAK-AFTER: ALWAYS; BACKGROUND-COLOR: RGB(0, 0, 0);">
<A NAME="eolPage3"></A>
<DIV ID="PGHDR" STYLE="WIDTH: 100%; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT;">
	&nbsp;
</DIV>
</DIV>
<P STYLE="MARGIN: 0PT 7.2PT 0PT 0PT; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<EFX_PART_I>
<A NAME="FIS_PART_I"></A>
<P STYLE="MARGIN: 0PT 7.2PT 0PT 0PT; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<B>
<A ID="PART1" NAME="FLWS20160912_10K_HTM_PART1">
</A>
	PART I
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN: 0PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<EFX_BUSINESS>
<A NAME="FIS_BUSINESS"></A>
<P STYLE="MARGIN: 0PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<B>
<A ID="ITEM1" NAME="FLWS20160912_10K_HTM_ITEM1">
</A>
	Item 1
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
	. BUSINESS
</FONT>
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN: 0PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN: 0PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<B>
	The Company
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN: 0PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<B>
	&nbsp;
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN: 0PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
	1-800-FLOWERS.COM, Inc. and its subsidiaries (collectively, the &ldquo;Company&rdquo;) is a leading provider of gourmet food and floral gifts for all occasions. For the past 40 years, 1-800-FLOWERS&reg; (1-800-356-9377 or www.1800flowers.com) has been helping deliver smiles for our customers with gifts for every occasion, including fresh flowers and the finest selection of plants, gift baskets, gourmet foods, confections, candles, balloons and plush stuffed animals. As always, our 100% Smile Guarantee&reg; backs every gift. The Company
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
	&rsquo;s Celebrations&reg; suite of services including Celebrations Passport&reg; Free Shipping program, Celebrations Rewards&reg; and Celebrations RemindersSM, are all designed to engage with customers and deepen relationships as a one-stop destination for all celebratory and gifting occasions. In 2016, 1-800-Flowers.com was awarded a Silver Stevie &ldquo;e-Commerce Customer Service&rdquo; Award, recognizing the Company&rsquo;s innovative use of online technologies and social media to service the needs of customers. In addition, 1-800-FLOWERS.COM, Inc. was recognized as one of Internet Retailer&rsquo;s Top 300 B2B e-commerce companies and was also recently named in Internet Retailer&rsquo;s 2016 Top Mobile 500 as one of the world&rsquo;s leading mobile commerce sites. The Company was included in Internet Retailer&rsquo;s 2015 Top 500 for fast growing e-commerce companies. In 2015, 1-800-FLOWERS.COM was named a winner of the &ldquo;Best Companies to Work for in New York State&rdquo; award by The New York Society for Human Resource Management (NYS-SHRM).
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN: 0PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN: 0PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
	The Company
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
	&rsquo;s BloomNet&reg; international floral wire service (www.mybloomnet.net) provides a broad range of quality products and value-added services designed to help professional florists grow their businesses profitably. The 1-800-FLOWERS.COM, Inc. &ldquo;Gift Shop&rdquo; also includes gourmet gifts such as premium, gift-quality fruits and other gourmet items from Harry &amp; David&reg; (1-877-322-1200 or www.harryanddavid.com), popcorn and specialty treats from The Popcorn Factory&reg; (1-800-541-2676 or www.thepopcornfactory.com); cookies and baked gifts from Cheryl&rsquo;s&reg; (1-800-443-8124 or www.cheryls.com); premium chocolates and confections from Fannie May&reg; (www.fanniemay.com and www.harrylondon.com); gift baskets and towers from 1-800- Baskets.com&reg; (www.1800baskets.com); premium English muffins and other breakfast treats from Wolferman&rsquo;s&reg; (1-800-999-1910 or www.wolfermans.com); carved fresh fruit arrangements from FruitBouquets.com (www.fruitbouquets.com); and top quality steaks and chops from Stock Yards&reg; (www.stockyards.com).
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN: 0PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN: 0PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
	On September 30, 2014, the Company completed its acquisition of Harry &amp; David Holdings, Inc. (&ldquo;Harry &amp; David&rdquo;), a leading multi-channel specialty retailer and producer of branded premium gift-quality fruit, gourmet food products and other gifts marketed under the Harry &amp; David&reg;, Wolferman
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
	&rsquo;s&reg; and Cushman&rsquo;s&reg; brands. The transaction, at a purchase price of $142.5 million, included the Harry &amp; David&rsquo;s brands and websites as well as its headquarters, manufacturing and distribution facilities and orchards in Medford, Oregon, a warehouse and distribution facility in Hebron, Ohio and 48 Harry &amp; David retail stores located throughout the country. Harry &amp; David&rsquo;s revenues were approximately $386 million in fiscal 2014, with Adjusted EBITDA of approximately $28 million. The historical results of Harry &amp; David, as well as applicable pro forma results are included in the Company&rsquo;s Form 8-K/A filed on December 16, 2014.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN: 0PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN: 0PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
	It should be noted that
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
	due to the timing of the acquisition, the revenues and EBITDA for fiscal 2015 do not include the results of Harry &amp; David for the fiscal first quarter of 2015, which is typically the lowest in terms of revenues, but includes significant losses due to the seasonality of its business. Refer to Non-GAAP reconciliation tables included within Item 7 of MD&amp;A which provide comparative pro forma information.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN: 0PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN: 0PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
	In order to finance the acquisition, on September 30, 2014, the Company entered into a Credit Agreement
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
	with JPMorgan Chase Bank as administrative agent, and a group of lenders (the &ldquo;2014 Credit Facility&rdquo;). See
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<A HREF="#FLWS20160912_10K_HTM_NOTE9">
	Note 9. Long-Term Debt in Item 15
</A>
	for details regarding the 2014 Credit Facility.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN: 0PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN: 0PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
	On November 27, 2014, a fire occurred at the Company&#39;s Maple Heights, Ohio warehouse and distribution facility. While the fire did not cause any injuries, the building was severely damaged, rendering it inoperable for the key calendar 2014 holiday season, and all Fannie May and Harry London confections in the facility were destroyed. As a result, the Company had limited supplies of its Fannie May Fine Chocolates and Harry London Chocolates products available in its retail stores as well as for its ecommerce and wholesale channels during the holiday season. While the Company implemented contingency plans to increase production for Fannie May Fine Chocolates and Harry London Chocolates products at its production facility in Canton, Ohio and to shift warehousing and distribution operations to alternate Company facilities, product availability was severely limited, impacting revenue and earnings during
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
	fiscal 2015.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
	Although the entire enterprise came together and was able to return to full capabilities within 5 months of the fire, the Company experienced unforeseen longer term consequences on its revenue base, especially within the brand&rsquo;s e-commerce and retail channels. With the benefit of 20/20 hindsight, it appears that the negative impact on revenues from the fire continued to drag beyond the Company&#39;s initial estimates, well into fiscal 2016. While the pace of Fannie May&rsquo;s recovery was below expectations throughout the year, the Company was able to offset this impact to earnings as it recovered its inventory lost to the fire through its property and business interruption policies, recognizing a gain of $19.6 million upon settlement in the first quarter of fiscal 2016.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN: 0PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<DIV ID="PGBK" STYLE="WIDTH: 100%; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT;">
<DIV ID="PGNUM" STYLE="WIDTH: 100%; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
	1
</DIV>
<HR STYLE="BORDER: CURRENTCOLOR; BORDER-IMAGE: NONE; WIDTH: 100%; HEIGHT: 2PX; COLOR: RGB(0, 0, 0); PAGE-BREAK-AFTER: ALWAYS; BACKGROUND-COLOR: RGB(0, 0, 0);">
<A NAME="eolPage4"></A>
<DIV ID="PGHDR" STYLE="WIDTH: 100%; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT;">
	&nbsp;
</DIV>
</DIV>
<P STYLE="MARGIN: 0PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN: 0PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
	During the fourth quarter of f
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
	iscal 2013, the Company made the strategic decision to divest the e-commerce and procurement businesses of its Winetasting Network subsidiary in order to focus on growth opportunities in its Gourmet Foods and Gift Baskets business segment. The Company closed on the sale of its Winetasting Network business on December 31, 2013. The Company has classified the results of the e-commerce and procurement business of The Winetasting Network as a discontinued operation in fiscal 2014.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN: 0PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN: 0PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
	Shares in 1-800-FLOWERS.COM, Inc. are traded on the NASDAQ Global Select Market, ticker symbol: FLWS.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN: 0PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN: 0PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
	References in this Annual Report on Form 10-K to &ldquo;1-800-FLOWERS.COM&rdquo; and the &ldquo;Company&rdquo; refer to 1-800-FLOWERS.COM, Inc. and its subsidiaries. The Company
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
	&rsquo;s principal offices are located at One Old Country Road, Suite 500, Carle Place, NY 11514 and its telephone number at that location is (516) 237-6000.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN: 0PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN: 0PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<B>
	The Origins of 1-800-FLOWERS.COM
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN: 0PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<B>
	&nbsp;
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN: 0PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
	The Company
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
	&rsquo;s operations began in 1976 when James F. McCann, the Company&rsquo;s founder and current Executive Chairman of the Board, acquired a single retail florist in New York City, which he subsequently expanded to a 14-store chain. Thereafter, the Company modified its business strategy to take advantage of the rapid emergence of toll-free calling. The Company acquired the right to use the toll-free telephone number 1-800-FLOWERS, adopted it as its corporate identity and began to aggressively build a national brand around it. The Company believes it was one of the first companies to embrace this new way of conducting business.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN: 0PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN: 0PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
	In order to support the growth of its toll-free business and to provide superior customer service, the Company developed an operating infrastructure that incorporated the best available technologies. Over time, the Company implemented a sophisticated transaction processing system that facilitated rapid order entry and fulfillment, an advanced telecommunications system and multiple customer service centers to handle increasing call volume.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN: 0PT 0PT 0PT 54PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -18PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN: 0PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
	To enable the Company to deliver products reliably nationwide on a same-day or next-day basis and to market pre-selected, high-quality floral products, the Company created BloomNet&reg;, a nationwide network including independent local florists selected for their high-quality products, superior customer service and order fulfillment and delivery capabilities.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN: 0PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN: 0PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
	As the world
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
	&rsquo;s leading florist and gift shop, 1-800-FLOWERS.COM offers a broad range of truly original gifts through a multi-channel strategy, making it easy for millions of customers to deliver smiles for every occasion. Complementing its retail, telephonic and ecommerce channels, 1-800-FLOWERS.COM is a pacesetter in social and mobile platforms, pioneering award-winning marketing programs and applications. As a result, the Company has developed relationships with customers who purchase products for both a broad range of celebratory gifting occasions as well as for everyday personal use. The Company offers a broad selection of unique products that a customer could expect to find in a high-end florist and gift shop, including a wide assortment of cut flowers and plants, candy, balloons, plush toys, giftware, gourmet gift baskets, and fruit bouquet arrangements. The Company has also significantly expanded its presence in the gourmet food and gift baskets category, which the Company has identified as having significant revenue and earnings growth potential, through a combination of organic initiatives and strategic acquisitions. The addition of Harry &amp; David in September 2014 accelerated the Company&rsquo;s strategy to leverage its leadership position built in the floral gifting category to create what is fast becoming a leading position in the growing Gourmet Foods and Gift Baskets category. The Gourmet Food &amp; Gift Baskets segment now represents 57% of the Company&rsquo;s overall revenues.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN: 0PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<DIV ID="PGBK" STYLE="WIDTH: 100%; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT;">
<DIV ID="PGNUM" STYLE="WIDTH: 100%; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
	2
</DIV>
<HR STYLE="BORDER: CURRENTCOLOR; BORDER-IMAGE: NONE; WIDTH: 100%; HEIGHT: 2PX; COLOR: RGB(0, 0, 0); PAGE-BREAK-AFTER: ALWAYS; BACKGROUND-COLOR: RGB(0, 0, 0);">
<A NAME="eolPage5"></A>
<DIV ID="PGHDR" STYLE="WIDTH: 100%; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT;">
	&nbsp;
</DIV>
</DIV>
<P STYLE="MARGIN: 0PT; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN: 0PT; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<B>
	The Company
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
	&rsquo;s Strategy
</FONT>
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN: 0PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<B>
	&nbsp;
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN: 0PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
	1-800-FLOWERS.COM
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
	&rsquo;s objective is to be the leading authority on thoughtful gifting, to serve an expanding range of our customers&rsquo; celebratory needs, thereby helping our customers express themselves and connect with the important people in their lives. The Company will continue to build on the trusted relationships with our customers by providing them with ease of access, tasteful and appropriate gifts, and superior service.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN: 0PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN: 0PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
	The Company believes that 1-800-FLOWERS.COM is one of the most recognized brands in the floral and gift industry. The strength of its brand has enabled the Company to extend its product offerings beyond the floral category into complementary products, which include gourmet popcorn, cookies and related baked and snack food products, premium chocolate and confections, wine gifts, gourmet gift baskets, fruit bouquet arrangements, as well as gift-quality fruit. This extension of gift offerings helps our customers in all of their celebratory occasions, and will enable the Company to increase the number of purchases and the average order value by existing customers who have come to trust the 1-800-FLOWERS.COM brand, as well as continue to attract new customers. As referenced later, the Company recently launched its new consolidated customer database and multi-brand website which should benefit all brands by further enhancing the Company
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
	&rsquo;s position as the leading, one-stop destination for all of our customers&rsquo; gifting and celebratory needs.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN: 0PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN: 0PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
	The Company believes its brands are characterized by:
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN: 0PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
	&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<TABLE BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" ID="MTAB2" STYLE="WIDTH: 100%; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 36PT;">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 13PT; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP;">
<P STYLE="MARGIN: 0PT; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
	&#9679;
</P>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<I>
<B>
	Convenience
</B>
</I>
	. All of the Company&rsquo;s product offerings can be purchased either via the web and wireless devices, or via the Company&rsquo;s toll-free telephone numbers, 24 hours a day, seven days a week, for those customers who prefer a personal gift advisor to assist them. The Company offers a variety of delivery options, including same-day or next-day service throughout the world.
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 36PT;">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 13PT; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP;">
<P STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT;">
	&#9679;
</P>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP;">
<P STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<I>
<B>
	Quality
</B>
</I>
	. High-quality products are critical to the Company&rsquo;s continued brand strength and are integral to the brand loyalty that it has built over the years. The Company offers its customers a 100% satisfaction guarantee on all of its products.
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<TABLE BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" ID="MTAB3" STYLE="WIDTH: 100%; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">

<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 36PT;">
	&nbsp;

<P STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT;">
	&#9679;
</P>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP;">
<P STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<I>
<B>
	Delivery Capability
</B>
</I>
	. The Company has developed a market-proven fulfillment infrastructure that allows delivery on a same-day, next-day and any-day basis. Key to the Company&rsquo;s fulfillment capability is an innov
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
	ative &ldquo;hybrid&rdquo; model which combines BloomNet (comprised of independent florists operating retail flower shops, Company-owned stores, and franchised stores), with its manufacturing and distribution centers located in California, Florida, Illinois, Massachusetts, Nevada, Ohio, Tennessee and Oregon, and third-party vendors who ship directly to the Company&rsquo;s customers.
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<TABLE BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" ID="MTAB4" STYLE="WIDTH: 100%; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">

</B>
</I>
	. Over the course of a year, the Company offers more than 11,000 varieties of fresh-cut flowers, floral and fruit bouquets and plants, and more than 11,200 SKUs of gifts, gourmet foods and gift baskets, cookies and chocolates.
</FONT>

<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<I>
<B>
	Customer Service
</B>
</I>
	. The Company strives to ensure that customer service, whether online, wireless, via the telephone, or in one of its retail stores is of the highest caliber. The Company operates customer service centers in Ohio and Oregon, while also utilizing a network of home agents and outsourcers to provide helpful assistance on everything from advice on product selection to the monitoring of the fulfillment and delivery process.
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>

	&nbsp;

<DIV ID="PGBK" STYLE="WIDTH: 100%; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT;">

<HR STYLE="BORDER: CURRENTCOLOR; BORDER-IMAGE: NONE; WIDTH: 100%; HEIGHT: 2PX; COLOR: RGB(0, 0, 0); PAGE-BREAK-AFTER: ALWAYS; BACKGROUND-COLOR: RGB(0, 0, 0);">

<DIV ID="PGHDR" STYLE="WIDTH: 100%; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT;">
	&nbsp;
</DIV>
</DIV>
<P STYLE="MARGIN: 0PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN: 0PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
	As part of the Company
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
	&rsquo;s continuing effort to serve the thoughtful gifting needs of its customers, and leverage its business platform, the Company continues to execute its vision to build a &ldquo;Celebratory Ecosystem&rdquo;, including a collection of premium gifting brands, and an increasing suite of products and services designed to help our customers deliver smiles to the important people in their lives. The Company intends to accomplish this through organic development, and where appropriate, through acquisition of complementary businesses. A summary of the Company&rsquo;s more significant brands and/or businesses follows:
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN: 0PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<EFX_UNIDENTIFIED_TABLE>
<A NAME="FIS_UNIDENTIFIED_TABLE_4"></A>
<TABLE BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" ID="TBL6" STYLE="WIDTH: 100%; TEXT-INDENT: 0PX; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<TR>
<TD COLSPAN="2" STYLE="BORDER: THIN SOLID RGB(0, 0, 0); BORDER-IMAGE: NONE; WIDTH: 100%; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP;">
<P STYLE="MARGIN: 0PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
	CONSUMER FLORAL SEGMENT
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 41.3%; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; BORDER-RIGHT-COLOR: RGB(0, 0, 0); BORDER-BOTTOM-COLOR: RGB(0, 0, 0); BORDER-LEFT-COLOR: RGB(0, 0, 0); BORDER-RIGHT-WIDTH: THIN; BORDER-BOTTOM-WIDTH: 1PX; BORDER-LEFT-WIDTH: THIN; BORDER-RIGHT-STYLE: SOLID; BORDER-BOTTOM-STYLE: SOLID; BORDER-LEFT-STYLE: SOLID;">

<IMG SRC="http://content.edgar-online.com/edgar_conv_img/2016/09/16/0001437749-16-038804_RDGF20160909_10KIMG001.JPG" STYLE="WIDTH: 136PT; HEIGHT: 40PT;">
</P>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 58.7%; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; BORDER-RIGHT-COLOR: RGB(0, 0, 0); BORDER-BOTTOM-COLOR: RGB(0, 0, 0); BORDER-RIGHT-WIDTH: THIN; BORDER-BOTTOM-WIDTH: 1PX; BORDER-RIGHT-STYLE: SOLID; BORDER-BOTTOM-STYLE: SOLID;">
<P STYLE="MARGIN: 0PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
	Direct-to-consumer provider of fresh flowers, plants, fruit and gift bas
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
	ket products, balloons, candles, keepsake gifts and plush stuffed animals.
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 41.3%; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; BORDER-RIGHT-COLOR: RGB(0, 0, 0); BORDER-BOTTOM-COLOR: RGB(0, 0, 0); BORDER-LEFT-COLOR: RGB(0, 0, 0); BORDER-RIGHT-WIDTH: THIN; BORDER-BOTTOM-WIDTH: 1PX; BORDER-LEFT-WIDTH: THIN; BORDER-RIGHT-STYLE: SOLID; BORDER-BOTTOM-STYLE: SOLID; BORDER-LEFT-STYLE: SOLID;">
<P STYLE="MARGIN: 0PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<IMG SRC="http://content.edgar-online.com/edgar_conv_img/2016/09/16/0001437749-16-038804_RDGF20160909_10KIMG002.JPG" STYLE="WIDTH: 119PT; HEIGHT: 41PT;">
</P>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 58.7%; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; BORDER-RIGHT-COLOR: RGB(0, 0, 0); BORDER-BOTTOM-COLOR: RGB(0, 0, 0); BORDER-RIGHT-WIDTH: THIN; BORDER-BOTTOM-WIDTH: 1PX; BORDER-RIGHT-STYLE: SOLID; BORDER-BOTTOM-STYLE: SOLID;">

<DIV ID="PGBK" STYLE="WIDTH: 100%; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT;">
<DIV ID="PGNUM" STYLE="WIDTH: 100%; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
	4
</DIV>
<HR STYLE="BORDER: CURRENTCOLOR; BORDER-IMAGE: NONE; WIDTH: 100%; HEIGHT: 2PX; COLOR: RGB(0, 0, 0); PAGE-BREAK-AFTER: ALWAYS; BACKGROUND-COLOR: RGB(0, 0, 0);">
<A NAME="eolPage7"></A>
<DIV ID="PGHDR" STYLE="WIDTH: 100%; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT;">
	&nbsp;
</DIV>
</DIV>
<P STYLE="MARGIN: 0PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN: 0PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
	As a complement to the Company
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
	&rsquo;s own brands and product lines, the Company has formed strategic relationships with brands such as Lenox&reg;, Waterford&reg;, Yankee Candle&reg;, Junior&rsquo;s&reg; Cheesecakes,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
	The Cheesecake Factory&reg;, Starbucks&reg; and Swarovski&reg;. The Company also continues to develop signature products in order to provide its customers with differentiated products and further its position as a destination for all of their gifting needs.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN: 0PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN: 0PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
	When the Company laun
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
	ched its integration efforts of Harry &amp; David in January of 2015, it created a holistic approach towards examining and operating the entire enterprise. A key feature of this approach is that the Company is proactively sharing best practices across all of its operational and functional areas, creating centers of excellence focused identifying initiatives designed to enhance top and bottom-line growth opportunities.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN: 0PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN: 0PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
	The Company believes that these initiatives and its continued focus on the following core values will drive long-term profitable growth:
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN: 0PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" ID="MTAB7" STYLE="WIDTH: 100%; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 36PT;">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 18PT; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP;">
<P STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT;">
<I>
	&#9679;
</I>
</P>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP;">
<P STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT;">
<I>
	Know and Take Care of Our Customer
</I>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
	-&nbsp;by providing the right products and the best services with consistent, excellent quality and value to help them express themselves and deliver smiles. In 2016, 1-800-Flowers.com was awarded a Silver Stevie &ldquo;e-Commerce Customer Service&rdquo; Award, recognizing the company&rsquo;s innovative use of online technologies and social media to service the needs of customers.
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN: 0PT 0PT 0PT 54PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" ID="MTAB8" STYLE="WIDTH: 100%; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 36PT;">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 18PT; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP;">
<P STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT;">
<I>
	&#9679;
</I>
</P>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP;">
<P STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT;">
<I>
	Maintain and enhance our Financial Strength and Flexibility
</I>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
	- by seeking ways to reduce our operating costs while strengthening our balance sheet and adding flexibility to our capital structure. During fiscal 2015, the Company completed the purchase of Harry &amp; David and in order to finance the acquisition entered into a credit agreement consisting of a term-loan and a new revolving credit facility, assuring capital availability and future flexibility. During fiscal 2016, the Company continued to pay off its long-term loan thereby strengthening the balance sheet.
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN: 0PT 0PT 0PT 54PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" ID="MTAB9" STYLE="WIDTH: 100%; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">

	&nbsp;

	&#9679;
</I>
</P>

<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP;">
<P STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT;">
<I>
	Continue to Innovate and Invest for the Future
</I>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
	-&nbsp;by investing in technology and new growth opportunities. 1-800-FLOWERS.COM, Inc. was recognized as one of Internet Retailer&rsquo;s Top 300 B2B e-commerce companies and was also recently named in Internet Retailer&rsquo;s 2016 Top Mobile 500 as one of the world&rsquo;s leading mobile commerce sites. The Company was included in Internet Retailer&rsquo;s 2015 Top 500 for fast growing e-commerce companies. In 2015, 1-800-FLOWERS.COM was named a winner of the &ldquo;Best Companies to Work for in New York State&rdquo; award by The New York Society for Human Resource Management (NYS-SHRM). The Company also continues to be a &ldquo;first mover&rdquo; in adopting new technologies such as:
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>

<TABLE BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" ID="MTAB13" STYLE="WIDTH: 100%; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">

	o

	being
